CVE-2010-3273.body: ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus is prone to multiple vulnerabilities, including multiple security-bypass and cross-site scripting vulnerabilities.Attackers can exploit these issues to bypass certain security restrictions and to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help them steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus 4.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-3274.title: ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3274.body: ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus is prone to multiple vulnerabilities, including multiple security-bypass and cross-site scripting vulnerabilities.Attackers can exploit these issues to bypass certain security restrictions and to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may help them steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus 4.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-3275.title: VLC Media Player '.AMV' and '.NSV' Files Multiple Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3275.body: VLC media player is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application or crash the application, denying service to legitimate users. Versions prior to VLC media player 1.1.8 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3276.title: VLC Media Player '.AMV' and '.NSV' Files Multiple Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3276.body: VLC media player is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the affected application or crash the application, denying service to legitimate users. Versions prior to VLC media player 1.1.8 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3280.title: Alcatel-Lucent OmniTouch Contact Center Security Bypass and Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3280.body: Alcatel-Lucent OmniTouch Contact Center is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability and an information-disclosure vulnerability.Attackers can exploit theses issues to obtain sensitive information or perform unauthorized actions.Versions prior to OmniTouch Contact Center Standard Edition 9.0.8.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3281.title: Alcatel-Lucent OmniVista 4760 HTTP Proxy Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3281.body: Alcatel-Lucent OmniVista 4760 is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.Versions prior to OmniVista 4760 R5.1.06.03.c_Patch3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3289.title: HP Systems Insight Manager CVE-2010-3289 Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3289.body: HP Systems Insight Manager is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.Versions prior to Systems Insight Manager 6.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3291.title: HP AssetCenter and AssetManager Unspecified Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3291.body: HP AssetCenter and AssetManager are prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because they fail to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.The following versions are affected:AssetCenter AC_5.03AssetManager AM_5.12 AssetManager AM_5.22

CVE-2010-3296.title: Linux Kernel 'CHELSIO_GET_QSET_NUM' Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3296.body: The Linux kernel is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.Successful exploits may allow attackers to obtain potentially sensitive information on the stack that may aid in other attacks.

CVE-2010-3298.title: Linux Kernel ''TIOCGICOUNT'' Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3298.body: The Linux kernel is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.Successful exploits may allow attackers to obtain potentially sensitive information on the stack that may aid in other attacks.

CVE-2010-3302.title: Openswan 'XAUTH' Remote Buffer Overflow and Command Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3302.body: Openswan is prone to remote buffer-overflow and command-injection vulnerabilities when it connects to a malicious Cisco compatible gateway using 'XAUTH'.An attacker can exploit the buffer-overflow issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.The attacker can exploit the remote command-injection issue to execute arbitrary shell commands in the context of the webserver hosting the vulnerable application. This may facilitate the remote compromise of affected computers.Openswan versions 2.6.25 to 2.6.28 are affected.

CVE-2010-3303.title: Mantis Multiple Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3303.body: Mantis is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.Versions prior to Mantis 1.2.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3304.title: Dovecot Access Control List (ACL) Plugin Security Bypass Weakness
CVE-2010-3304.body: Dovecot is prone to a security-bypass weakness because INBOX Access Control Lists (ACLs) could be used as the default for new mailboxes.Attackers can exploit this issue to bypass intended security restrictions. This may aid in further attacks.Versions prior to Dovecot 1.2.13 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3308.title: Openswan 'XAUTH' Remote Buffer Overflow and Command Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3308.body: Openswan is prone to remote buffer-overflow and command-injection vulnerabilities when it connects to a malicious Cisco compatible gateway using 'XAUTH'.An attacker can exploit the buffer-overflow issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.The attacker can exploit the remote command-injection issue to execute arbitrary shell commands in the context of the webserver hosting the vulnerable application. This may facilitate the remote compromise of affected computers.Openswan versions 2.6.25 to 2.6.28 are affected.

CVE-2010-3310.title: Linux Kernel Rose Protocol 'srose_ndigis' Heap Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3310.body: Linux Kernel is prone to a heap-based memory-corruption vulnerability because it fails to properly verify signedness of user-supplied values.Local attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers. Failed exploits can result in a denial-of-service.

CVE-2010-3311.title: FreeType Rendering Engine Position Value Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3311.body: FreeType is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability.Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of an application using the affected library. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2010-3328.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Uninitialized Memory CVE-2010-3328 Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3328.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow an attacker to run arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2010-3329.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Uninitialized Memory Word Document Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3329.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow an attacker to run arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.The following versions of the 'mshtmled.dll' library are affected: 8.0.6001.18702 8.0.6001.18000 7.0.6000.17023 7.0.6000.17080

CVE-2010-3333.title: Microsoft Office RTF File Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3333.body: Microsoft Office is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the software fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing a victim to open a malicious RTF file or view an email in RTF format. Successfully exploiting this issue would allow the attacker to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2010-3334.title: Microsoft Office Art Drawing Record Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3334.body: Microsoft Office is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.An attacker could exploit this issue by enticing a victim to open a malicious Office file. Successfully exploiting this issue would allow the attacker to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2010-3335.title: Microsoft Office Drawing Exception Handling Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3335.body: Microsoft Office is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.An attacker could exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting victim to open a malicious Office file. Successfully exploiting this issue would allow the attacker to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2010-3336.title: Microsoft Office Large SPID Read AV Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3336.body: Microsoft Office is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability.An attacker could exploit this issue by enticing a victim to open a malicious Office file. Successfully exploiting this issue would allow the attacker to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2010-3350.title: bareFTP 'LD_LIBRARY_PATH' Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3350.body: bareFTP is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.An attacker could exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting victim to run an application in a directory containing a malicious library file with a specific name. Exploiting this issue allows local attackers to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the affected application.bareFTP 0.3.4 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-3404.title: eshtery CMS 'catlgsearch.aspx' and 'adminlogin.aspx' Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3404.body: eshtery CMS is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.eshtery CMS copyrights 2003-2004 is affected; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3405.title: IBM AIX Local Privilege Escalation and Security Bypass Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3405.body: IBM AIX is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability and a security-bypass vulnerability.Note: Attackers require system group permissions to exploit these issues.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code using superuser privileges or to delete sensitive files from the system. Successful exploits will completely compromise affected computers.

CVE-2010-3407.title: IBM Lotus Domino iCalendar Remote Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3407.body: IBM Lotus Domino is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input.Successfully exploiting this issue may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the 'nrouter.exe' Lotus Domino server process. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.Versions prior to IBM Lotus Domino 8.0.2 Fix Pack 5, 8.5.1 Fix Pack 2, and 8.5.2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3418.title: NetArt Media Car Portal 'y' Parameter Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3418.body: NetArt Media Car Portal is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary HTML and script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.NetArt Media Car Portal 2.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-3421.title: ProductCart 'AffiliateLogin.asp' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3421.body: ProductCart is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.ProductCart 3.0 and prior versions are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3426.title: 4you-studio jPhone Joomla! Component 'controller' Parameter Local File Include Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3426.body: The jPhone (com_jphone) component for Joomla! is prone to a local file-include vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to obtain potentially sensitive information or to execute arbitrary local scripts in the context of the webserver process. This may allow the attacker to compromise the application and the computer; other attacks are also possible.4you-studio jPhone 1.0 Alpha 3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-3432.title: Linux Kernel 'sctp_outq_flush()' Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3432.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to properly handle user-supplied input.Attackers can exploit this issue with a malicious remote 'SCTP' instance to cause the kernel to crash, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2010-3433.title: PostgreSQL PL/Perl and PL/Tcl Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3433.body: PostgreSQL is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability.Exploiting this issue allows local attackers to gain elevated privileges and execute arbitrary commands with the privileges of the victim.Versions prior to PostgreSQL 9.0.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3436.title: PHP 'open_basedir' Security-Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3436.body: PHP is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability.Successful exploits will allow attackers to bypass certain security restrictions.

CVE-2010-3437.title: Linux Kernel 'PKT_CTRL_CMD_STATUS' Invalid Pointer Dereference Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3437.body: The Linux kernel is prone to an invalid pointer dereference denial-of-service vulnerability.An attacker with permissions to open '/dev/pktcdvd/control' can exploit this issue to read arbitrary kernel memory or cause the kernel to crash, denying service to legitimate users. Due to the nature of the issue, code execution may be possible; this has not been confirmed.

CVE-2010-3442.title: Linux Kernel ALSA 'sound/core/control.c' Local Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3442.body: The Linux kernel Advanced Linux Sound Architecture (ALSA) is prone to a local heap-based integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly validate user-supplied input.Unprivileged users who have permission to open a '/dev/snd/controlC*' device (members of the 'audio' group in most distributions) can trigger this issue.Local attackers can exploit this issue to run arbitrary code with elevated privileges. Failed exploit attempts may crash the affected kernel, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2010-3444.title: FriBidi Python binding (pyfribidi) Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3444.body: FriBidi Python binding (pyfribidi) is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user-supplied data.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts may result in a denial-of-service condition.NOTE: pyfribidi is affected only if Fribidi 0.19.1 or later is installed.

CVE-2010-3445.title: Wireshark Malformed SNMP V1 Packet Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3445.body: Wireshark is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to handle user-supplied input. Successfully exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.Wireshark 1.4.0 are vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-3449.title: Apache Archiva Cross Site Request Forgery Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3449.body: Apache Archiva is prone to a cross-site request-forgery vulnerability.Exploiting this issue may allow a remote attacker to perform certain administrative actions and gain unauthorized access to the affected application. Other attacks are also possible. The following versions are affected:Archiva versions 1.0 through 1.0.3Archiva versions 1.1 through 1.1.4Archiva versions 1.2 through 1.2.2Archiva versions 1.3 through 1.3.1

CVE-2010-3450.body: OpenOffice is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will crash the application. Attackers may also create or overwrite local files by exploiting the directory-traversal issue.

CVE-2010-3452.title: OpenOffice Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3452.body: OpenOffice is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will crash the application. Attackers may also create or overwrite local files by exploiting the directory-traversal issue.

CVE-2010-3453.body: OpenOffice is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. CVE-2010-3456.title: EnergyScripts ES Simple Download 'file' Parameter Local File Include Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3456.body: ES Simple Download is prone to a local file-include vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to obtain potentially sensitive information and execute arbitrary local scripts in the context of the webserver process. This may allow the attacker to compromise the application and the underlying computer; other attacks are also possible.EnergyScripts ES Simple Download 1.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-3457.title: Symphony SQL Injection and HTML Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3457.body: Symphony is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability and an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage these issues to compromise the application, access or modify data, exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database, or execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, control how the site is viewed, and launch other attacks.Symphony 2.1.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-3458.body: Symphony is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability and an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage these issues to compromise the application, access or modify data, exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database, or execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, control how the site is viewed, and launch other attacks.Symphony 2.1.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-3474.title: IBM DB2 prior to 9.7 Fix Pack 3 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3474.body: IBM DB2 is prone to multiple remote vulnerabilities. Successful exploits of these issues will allow attackers to bypass certain restriction, perform unauthorized actions, and gain elevated privileges in the database.An attacker may need a valid user account to carry out this attack. IBM DB2 9.7 Fix Pack 2 and prior versions are affected.

CVE-2010-3475.title: IBM DB2 prior to 9.7 Fix Pack 3 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities

CVE-2010-3476.title: OTRS Core System Multiple Cross-Site Scripting and Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3476.body: OTRS is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities and a denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to properly handle user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage these issues to cause denial-of-service conditions or to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site.OTRS versions prior to 2.3.6 and 2.4.8 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3480.title: PHP MicroCMS Local File Include and SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3480.body: PHP MicroCMS is prone to a local file-include vulnerability and multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker can exploit the local file-include vulnerability using directory-traversal strings to view and execute arbitrary local files within the context of the webserver process. Information harvested may aid in further attacks.The attacker can exploit the SQL-injection vulnerabilities to compromise the application, access or modify data, exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database, or bypass the authentication control.PHP MicroCMS 1.0.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-3481.title: PHP MicroCMS Local File Include and SQL Injection Vulnerabilities

Exploiting this issue will allow an attacker to read files outside the webroot directory. CVE-2010-3488.title: QuickShare Directory Traversal Vulnerability

Other attacks may also be possible.Versions prior to OpenID 5.x-1.4 are vulnerable.http://drupal.org/node/207891

CVE-2010-3689.title: OpenOffice Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3689.body: OpenOffice is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will crash the application. Attackers may also create or overwrite local files by exploiting the directory-traversal issue.

CVE-2010-3690.title: phpCAS Proxy Mode Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3690.body: phpCAS is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities, including multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities, a directory-traversal vulnerability, and a privilege-escalation vulnerability.Attackers can exploit the cross-site scripting issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials or launch other attacks.Successfully exploiting the directory-traversal issue allows attackers to view arbitrary local files and directories within the context of the webserver.Local attackers can exploit the privilege-escalation issue to gain elevated privileges on the affected computer. This may result in the complete compromise of the computer.The following versions are vulnerable:phpCAS 1.0.1, 1.1.0, 1.1.1, 1.1.2.

CVE-2010-3692.title: phpCAS Proxy Mode Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3692.body: phpCAS is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities, including multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities, a directory-traversal vulnerability, and a privilege-escalation vulnerability.Attackers can exploit the cross-site scripting issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials or launch other attacks.Successfully exploiting the directory-traversal issue allows attackers to view arbitrary local files and directories within the context of the webserver.Local attackers can exploit the privilege-escalation issue to gain elevated privileges on the affected computer. This may result in the complete compromise of the computer.The following versions are vulnerable:phpCAS 1.0.1, 1.1.0, 1.1.1, 1.1.2.

CVE-2010-3695.title: Horde IMP Webmail 'fetchmailprefs.php' HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3695.body: Horde IMP Webmail is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before it is used in dynamic content.Attacker-supplied HTML or JavaScript code could run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible.Horde IMP 4.3.7 is affected; other versions may also be vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3699.title: Xen 'blkback/blktap/netback' Leaked Kernel Thread Local Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3699.body: Xen is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to properly remove a guest's references to the host device. An attacker with access to a guest operating system can exploit this issue to leak kernel threads, preventing a future teardown. The guest will remain in a zombie state, causing the host to fully or partially stop responding.

CVE-2010-3702.title: XPDF 'Gfx::getPos()' (CVE-2010-3702) Unitialized Pointer Dereference Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3702.body: An attacker can exploit this issue by tricking an unsuspecting victim into opening a malicious PDF file with an affected application.Successful exploits will result in the execution of arbitrary attacker-supplied code in the context of the user running the affected application.

CVE-2010-3704.title: Xpdf 'FoFiType1::parse()' Array Indexing Error Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3704.body: Xpdf is prone to a vulnerability due to an array-indexing error.An attacker can exploit this issue by tricking an unsuspecting victim into opening a malicious PDF file with an affected application.Successful exploits will result in the execution of arbitrary attacker-supplied code in the context of the user running the affected application.

CVE-2010-3709.title: PHP ZipArchive::getArchiveComment() NULL Pointer Dereference Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3709.body: PHP is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability caused by a NULL pointer dereference.An attacker can exploit this issue to cause the application to crash, denying service to legitimate users. Due to the nature of the issue, code execution may be possible; however, it has not been confirmed.PHP 5.2 and 5.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3710.title: PHP 'php_filter_validate_email()' Function Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3710.body: PHP is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful attacks will cause the application to crash, creating a denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code-execution may be possible; however this has not been confirmed.PHP 5.3.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-3711.title: Pidgin 'libpurple' Multiple Denial of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3711.body: Pidgin is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities.Successful exploits will crash the application or make it unresponsive, denying service to legitimate users. Pidgin versions prior to 2.7.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3714.body: TYPO3 is prone to multiple security vulnerabilities, including:Multiple cross-site-scripting vulnerabilitiesMultiple remote file-disclosure vulnerabilitiesA privilege-escalation vulnerabilityA denial-of-service vulnerabilityAn attacker can exploit these issues to view and read arbitrary files, execute arbitrary script code, steal cookie-based authentication credentials, gain unauthorized access to the affected application, and deny service to legitimate users. Other attacks are also possible.The follow versions are affected:TYPO3 4.2 (4.2.14 and prior)TYPO3 4.3 (4.3.6 and prior) TYPO3 4.4 (4.4.3 and prior)

CVE-2010-3719.title: Symantec IM Manager 'eval()' Code Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3719.body: Symantec IM Manager is prone to a vulnerability that will let attackers run arbitrary code.Remote attackers can exploit this issue to run arbitrary code in the context of the affected application.IM Manager versions prior to 8.4.17 are affected.

CVE-2010-3752.title: Openswan 'XAUTH' Remote Buffer Overflow and Command Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3752.body: Openswan is prone to remote buffer-overflow and command-injection vulnerabilities when it connects to a malicious Cisco compatible gateway using 'XAUTH'.An attacker can exploit the buffer-overflow issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.The attacker can exploit the remote command-injection issue to execute arbitrary shell commands in the context of the webserver hosting the vulnerable application. This may facilitate the remote compromise of affected computers.Openswan versions 2.6.25 to 2.6.28 are affected.

CVE-2010-3753.title: Openswan 'XAUTH' Remote Buffer Overflow and Command Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3753.body: Openswan is prone to remote buffer-overflow and command-injection vulnerabilities when it connects to a malicious Cisco compatible gateway using 'XAUTH'.An attacker can exploit the buffer-overflow issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.The attacker can exploit the remote command-injection issue to execute arbitrary shell commands in the context of the webserver hosting the vulnerable application. This may facilitate the remote compromise of affected computers.Openswan versions 2.6.25 to 2.6.28 are affected.

CVE-2010-3762.title: ISC BIND 9 DNSSEC Validation Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3762.body: ISC BIND is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability because the software fails to handle certain bad signatures in a DNS query. An attacker can exploit this issue to cause the application to crash, denying service to legitimate users. Versions prior to BIND 9.7.2-P2 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3763.title: Mantis 'summary_api.php' HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3763.body: Mantis is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content.Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.Versions prior to Mantis 1.2.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3765.title: Mozilla Firefox 3.5/3.6 Remote Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3765.body: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a remote heap-buffer-overflow vulnerability.Successful exploits will allow an attacker to run arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application. Failed attacks may cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2010-3766.body: Mozilla Firefox and SeaMonkey are prone to a use-after-free memory corruption vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user into viewing a page containing malicious content. A successful exploit will result in the execution of arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.This issue is fixed in:Firefox 3.6.13Firefox 3.5.16SeaMonkey 2.0.11NOTE: This issue was previously covered in BID 45322 (Mozilla Firefox/Thunderbird/SeaMonkey MFSA 2010-74 -82, 84 Multiple Vulnerabilities), but has been assigned its own record to better document it.

CVE-2010-3768.body: Mozilla Firefox, SeaMonkey, and Thunderbird are prone to multiple unspecified vulnerabilities. The vulnerabilities occur in the operating system (OS) font code. These issues are fixed in:Firefox 3.6.13Firefox 3.5.16Thunderbird 3.0.11Thunderbird 3.1.7SeaMonkey 2.0.11

CVE-2010-3778.body: Mozilla Firefox is prone to a memory-corruption vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user into viewing a page containing malicious content. CVE-2010-3787.title: Apple QuickTime JP2 Image Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3787.body: Apple QuickTime is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability.Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user; failed exploit attempts will cause denial-of-service conditions.NOTE: This issue was previously covered in BID 44778 (Apple Mac OS X Prior to 10.6.5 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities), but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2010-3790.title: Apple QuickTime Movie and '.pict' Files Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3790.body: Apple QuickTime is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability.Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user; failed exploit attempts will cause denial-of-service conditions.This issue affects Apple Mac OS X 10.6 to 10.6.4 and Mac OS X Server 10.6 to 10.6.4.NOTE: This issue was previously covered in BID 44778 (Apple Mac OS X Prior to 10.6.5 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2010-3812.title: WebKit 'Text' Objects Integer Overflow Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3812.body: WebKit is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user into visiting a malicious webpage. Successful attacks will allow attackers to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.NOTE: This issue was previously covered in BID 44938 (Apple Safari Prior to 5.0.3 and 4.1.3 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2010-3814.title: FreeType TrueType Font Handling 'ttinterp.c' Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3814.body: FreeType is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2010-3833.title: Oracle MySQL Prior to 5.1.51 Multiple Denial Of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3833.body: MySQL is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities.An attacker can exploit these issues to crash the database, denying access to legitimate users. These issues affect versions prior to MySQL 5.1.51.

CVE-2010-3835.title: Oracle MySQL Prior to 5.1.51 Multiple Denial Of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3835.body: MySQL is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities.An attacker can exploit these issues to crash the database, denying access to legitimate users. These issues affect versions prior to MySQL 5.1.51.

CVE-2010-3836.title: Oracle MySQL Prior to 5.1.51 Multiple Denial Of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3836.body: MySQL is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities.An attacker can exploit these issues to crash the database, denying access to legitimate users. These issues affect versions prior to MySQL 5.1.51.

CVE-2010-3837.title: Oracle MySQL Prior to 5.1.51 Multiple Denial Of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3837.body: MySQL is prone to multiple denial-of-service vulnerabilities.An attacker can exploit these issues to crash the database, denying access to legitimate users. These issues affect versions prior to MySQL 5.1.51.

CVE-2010-3841.title: TWiki Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3841.body: TWiki is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.Versions prior to TWiki 5.0.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3846.title: CVS CVE-2010-3846 RCS File Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3846.body: CVS is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input before copying it to an insufficiently sized buffer.A local attacker can exploit this issue by storing a malicious RCS file in the CVS repository, and enticing an unsuspecting user to update their CVS repository tree with the file. Successful exploitation allows the attacker to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the vulnerable application. Failed attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2010-3851.title: libguestfs Disk Format Specifier Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3851.body: The 'libguestfs' library is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.Attackers with administrative privileges on a guest operating system can leverage this issue to read arbitrary files on the host operating system. Information harvested may aid in launching further attacks.

CVE-2010-3852.title: Luci Spoofed Ticket Cookie Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3852.body: Luci is prone to an authentication-bypass vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this issue to gain unauthorized access to the affected application.

CVE-2010-3854.title: Apache CouchDB Web Administration Interface Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3854.body: Apache CouchDB is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.Apache CouchDB 0.8.0 up to and including 1.0.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3855.title: FreeType 'ft_var_readpackedpoints()' Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3855.body: FreeType is prone to a remote buffer-overflow vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.FreeType 2.4.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-3856.title: GNU glibc Dynamic Linker 'LD_AUDIT' Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3856.body: The GNU C library (GNU glibc) is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of setuid applications using the affected library. This may allow the attacker to gain superuser privileges and fully compromise the affected system.

CVE-2010-3859.title: Linux Kernel Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3859.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges, facilitating the complete compromise of affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2010-3860.title: OpenJDK 'IcedTea' plugin (CVE-2010-3860) Unspecified Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3860.body: OpenJDK 'IcedTea' plugin is prone to a remote unspecified information-disclosure vulnerability.Successful exploits will allow attackers to gain access to sensitive information on systems using the vulnerable application.OpenJDK 6 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-3861.title: Linux Kernel ETHTOOL_GRXCLSRLALL Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3861.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability.Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2010-3863.title: Apache Shiro Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3863.body: Apache Shiro is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input.Exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information that could aid in further attacks.Apache Shiro 1.0.0 is vulnerable; other versions may be affected.

CVE-2010-3865.title: Linux Kernel Reliable Datagram Sockets (RDS) Protocol Local Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3865.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly validate user-supplied input.Local attackers can exploit this issue to run arbitrary code with elevated privileges. Failed exploit attempts may crash the affected kernel, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2010-3867.title: ProFTPD Multiple Remote Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3867.body: ProFTPD is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability and a directory-traversal vulnerability because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data.A remote attacker can exploit the buffer-overflow vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.A remote attacker can exploit the directory-traversal vulnerability to download and upload arbitrary files outside of the FTP server root directory. This may aid in further attacks.ProFTPD version 1.3.3 is vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3870.title: PHP 'xml_utf8_decode()' UTF-8 Input Validation Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3870.body: PHP is prone to a vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting this issue can allow attackers to provide unexpected input and possibly bypass input-validation protection mechanisms. This can aid in further attacks that may utilize crafted user-supplied input.Versions prior to PHP 5.3.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3871.title: Mahara 'groupviews.tpl' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3871.body: Mahara is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary HTML and script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks. Versions prior to Mahara 1.3.3 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3872.title: Apache 'mod_fcgid' Module Unspecified Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3872.body: The Apache 'mod_fcgid' module is prone to a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability.Very few technical details are currently available. We will update this BID as more information emerges.Successfully exploiting this issue allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2010-3875.title: Linux Kernel Multiple 'net/' Subsystems Local Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3875.body: The Linux kernel is prone to multiple local information-disclosure vulnerabilities. Local attackers can exploit these issues to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2010-3881.title: Linux Kernel Multiple 'kvm/x86.c' Local Information Disclosure Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3881.body: The Linux kernel is prone to multiple local information-disclosure vulnerabilities.Local attackers can exploit these issues to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.

CVE-2010-3905.title: Eucalyptus Administrator Password Reset Security Bypass Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3905.body: Eucalyptus is prone to a security-bypass vulnerability related to the password-reset feature.An attacker can exploit this issue to reset the application's administrator password and gain administrative privileges.

CVE-2010-3906.title: Git gitweb 'index.php' Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3906.body: Git 'gitweb' is prone to multiple cross-site-scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may let the attacker steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.Git 1.7.3.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-3907.title: VLC Media Player Real Demuxer Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3907.body: VLC media player is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability because the application fails to sufficiently validate user-supplied input.Attackers may leverage this issue to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users. Due to the nature of this issue, arbitrary code-execution may be possible; however this has not been confirmed.VLC Media Player versions prior to 1.1.6 are affected.

CVE-2010-3924.title: Aimluck Products Unspecified SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3924.body: Aimluck products are prone to an unspecified SQL-injection vulnerability because they fail to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Versions prior to Aipo 5.1.0.1 and Aipo ASP 5.1.0 1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3926.title: SGX-SP Final 'shop.cgi' Multiple Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-3926.body: SGX-SP Final is prone to multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. CVE-2010-3937.title: Microsoft Exchange Server 2007 Infinite Loop Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3937.body: Microsoft Exchange Server is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability.A successful exploit will allow a remote attacker to cause the application to stop responding, denying service to legitimate users.The issue affects Microsoft Exchange Server 2007 Service Pack 2 for x64-based systems.

CVE-2010-3960.title: Microsoft Hyper-V VMBus Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3960.body: Microsoft Hyper-V is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability.Using a guest system, a local attacker can exploit this issue to force the Hyper-V server to become unresponsive, denying service to legitimate users. The denial-of-service conditions would also affect other guest operating systems. The issue affects Hyper-V on Microsoft Windows Server 2008 and Windows Server 2008 R2. Microsoft Hyper-V Server 2008 and Microsoft Hyper-V Server 2008 R2 are also affected.

CVE-2010-3961.title: Microsoft Windows Consent User Interface Registry Key Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3961.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability that occurs in Consent User Interface. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with 'LocalSystem' privileges. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers.NOTE: An attacker must have 'SeImpersonatePrivilege' rights to exploit this issue.

CVE-2010-3962.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer CSS Tags Uninitialized Memory Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3962.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability. Successful exploits will allow an attacker to run arbitrary code in the context of the user running the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.

CVE-2010-3963.title: Microsoft Windows Kernel NDProxy Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3963.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a local privilege-escalation vulnerability that occurs in the Windows kernel. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges. Successful exploits will result in the complete compromise of affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will cause a denial-of-service.

CVE-2010-3970.title: Microsoft Windows 'CreateSizedDIBSECTION()' Thumbnail View Stack Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3970.body: Microsoft Windows is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability in the Windows Graphics Rendering Engine because the software fails to perform adequate boundary-checks on user-supplied data.An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to open a malicious '.MIC' or office file.NOTE: To exploit this issue, the target must view the malicious document in the 'Thumbnails' view.Successfully exploiting this issue would allow the attacker to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code in the context of the currently logged-in user. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2010-3971.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer CSS Parsing Remote Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3971.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to view a specially crafted web page.Successfully exploiting this issue may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in denial-of-service conditions.Internet Explorer versions 6, 7, and 8 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-3972.title: Microsoft IIS FTP Service Remote Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3972.body: Microsoft IIS is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability affecting the application's FTP service.Successful exploits may allow attackers to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the FTP service, resulting in denial-of-service conditions. IIS 7.5 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-3973.title: Microsoft WMI Administrative Tools ActiveX Control Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
CVE-2010-3973.body: Microsoft WMI Administrative Tools is prone to a remote code-execution vulnerability that affects the WMI Object Viewer ('WBEMSingleView.ocx') ActiveX control.An attacker can exploit this issue by enticing an unsuspecting user to view a malicious webpage.Successful exploits will allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code within the context of the application (typically Internet Explorer) that uses the ActiveX control.Microsoft WMI Administrative Tools 1.1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-4410.title: WebKit SVG CVE-2010-3113 Memory Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4410.body: WebKit is prone to a remote memory-corruption vulnerability.Successful exploits may allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.NOTE: This issue was previously covered in BID 42571 (Google Chrome prior to 5.0.375.127 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities), but has been assigned its own record to better document it.

CVE-2010-4480.title: phpMyAdmin Error Page Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4480.body: phpMyAdmin is prone to a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.Versions prior to phpMyAdmin 3.4.0-beta1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-4496.title: TIBCO Session Fixation and Multiple Input Validation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-4496.body: TIBCO Collaborative Information Manager and ActiveCatalog is prone to multiple vulnerabilities, including SQL-injection, cross-site scripting, information-disclosure, and session-fixation issues.Successful exploits of these vulnerabilities can allow attackers to compromise the applications, access or modify data, exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database, execute arbitrary script code in a user's browser in the context of the webserver process, access sensitive data, or hijack a user's session.The following products are vulnerable: TIBCO Collaborative Information Manager versions prior to 8.1.0 TIBCO ActiveCatalog versions prior to 1.0.1

CVE-2010-4497.title: TIBCO Session Fixation and Multiple Input Validation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-4497.body: TIBCO Collaborative Information Manager and ActiveCatalog is prone to multiple vulnerabilities, including SQL-injection, cross-site scripting, information-disclosure, and session-fixation issues.Successful exploits of these vulnerabilities can allow attackers to compromise the applications, access or modify data, exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database, execute arbitrary script code in a user's browser in the context of the webserver process, access sensitive data, or hijack a user's session.The following products are vulnerable: TIBCO Collaborative Information Manager versions prior to 8.1.0 TIBCO ActiveCatalog versions prior to 1.0.1

CVE-2010-4506.title: Oracle Passlogix v-GO Self-Service Password Reset Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4506.body: Oracle Passlogix v-GO Self-Service Password Reset is prone to a remote vulnerability that allows unauthorized access.An attacker can exploit this issue to view and execute arbitrary files on the target system. Successful exploits may aid in a compromise of the underlying computer. Oracle Passlogix v-GO Self-Service Password Reset versions prior to 7.0A are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-4514.title: DotNetNuke 'InstallWizard.aspx' Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4514.body: DotNetNuke is prone to a cross-site-scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input.An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This can allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and launch other attacks.DotNetNuke 5.5.1 is vulnerable; prior versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-4523.title: OpenSC Smart Card Serial Number Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-4523.body: OpenSC is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because the application fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied input.Attackers may leverage these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions.OpenSC 0.11.13 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-4524.title: MHonArc HTML Mail Conversion Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4524.body: MHonArc is prone to a cross-site-scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials and to launch other attacks.MHonArc 2.6.16-1 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-4525.title: Linux Kernel 'kvm_vcpu_events.interrupt.pad' Field Local Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4525.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a local information-disclosure vulnerability.Local attackers can exploit this issue to obtain sensitive information that may lead to further attacks.Linux Kernel 2.6.33.x and 2.6.34.x are affected.

CVE-2010-4528.title: Libpurple MSN Short Packets Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4528.body: Libpurple is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability that stems from insufficient validation of network packets.Exploiting the issue may allow an attacker to crash affected applications, denying service to legitimate users.Libpurple versions 2.7.6 through 2.7.8 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-4530.title: CCID Card Serial Number Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4530.body: CCID is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability. Attackers may leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. CCID 1.4.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-4531.title: PCSC-Lite 'atrhandler.c' Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4531.body: PCSC-Lite is prone to a local buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to adequately bounds-check user-supplied input. Attackers can leverage this issue to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed attacks will cause denial-of-service conditions. PCSC-Lite 1.5.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-4534.title: Django 'django.contrib.admin' Querystring Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4534.body: Django is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently restrict an administrative user's access to sensitive information via querystrings.Exploiting this issue may allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information that could aid in further attacks.Versions prior to Django 1.2.4, 1.1.3, and 1.3 beta 1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-4535.title: Django Password Reset Mechanism Remote Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4535.body: Django is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability because it fails to validate certain input while resetting a password.Exploiting this issue allows remote attackers to consume excessive server resources, causing denial-of-service conditions.Versions prior to Django 1.2.4, 1.1.3, and 1.3 beta 1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-4538.title: Wireshark ENTTEC DMX Data RLE Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4538.body: Wireshark is prone to a buffer-overflow vulnerability. Exploiting this issue may allow attackers to crash the application and deny service to legitimate users. Attackers may also execute arbitrary code in the context of vulnerable users running the application. Wireshark 1.4.2 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-4539.title: Apache Subversion Server Component Multiple Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-4539.body: Apache Subversion is prone to multiple remote denial-of-service vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to crash the subversion server.Versions prior to Apache Subversion 1.6.15 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-4556.title: SAP NetWeaver Business Client ActiveX Control Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-4556.body: SAP NetWeaver Business Client SapThemeRepository ('sapwdpcd.dll') ActiveX control is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilitiesAttackers can exploit these issues by enticing an unsuspecting user to view a malicious webpage. Successfully exploiting these issues will allow attackers to execute arbitrary within the context of the application (typically Internet Explorer) that uses the ActiveX control.

CVE-2010-4565.title: Linux Kernel CAN Protocol Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4565.body: The Linux kernel is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability.Successful exploits may allow attackers to obtain potentially sensitive information that may aid in other attacks.

CVE-2010-4567.body: Bugzilla is prone to the following vulnerabilities:1. A security-bypass issue.2. Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities.3. Multiple cross-site request-forgery vulnerabilities.Successfully exploiting these issues may allow an attacker to bypass certain security restrictions, execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user, steal cookie-based authentication credentials or perform certain administrative actions and perform actions in the vulnerable application in the context of the victim.The following versions are vulnerable:3.2.x versions prior to 3.2.103.4.x versions prior to 3.4.103.6.x versions prior to 3.6.44.x versions prior to 4.0rc2

CVE-2010-4573.title: VMware ESXi Update Installer Unauthorized Access Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4573.body: VMware ESXi is prone to an unauthorized-access vulnerability.An attacker can exploit this issue to access a vulnerable server with any username and password combination.This issue affects ESXi 4.1.

CVE-2010-4575.title: Google Chrome prior to 8.0.552.224 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-4575.body: Google Chrome is prone to multiple vulnerabilities. Attackers may exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the browser or cause denial-of-service conditions; other attacks are also possible.Chrome versions 8.x prior to 8.0.552.224 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-4576.title: Google Chrome prior to 8.0.552.224 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-4576.body: Google Chrome is prone to multiple vulnerabilities. Attackers may exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the browser or cause denial-of-service conditions; other attacks are also possible.Chrome versions 8.x prior to 8.0.552.224 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-4577.title: WebKit CSS Token Sequences Handling Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4577.body: WebKit is prone to a denial-of-service vulnerability. Attackers can exploit this issues to crash the affected application, denying service to legitimate users.This issue was previously discussed in BID 45390 (Google Chrome prior to 8.0.552.224 Multiple Security Vulnerabilities) but has been given its own record to better document it.

CVE-2010-4597.title: Ecava IntegraXor Remote Stack-based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4597.body: Ecava IntegraXor is prone to a remote stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code within the context of the affected application. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2010-4598.title: Ecava IntegraXor 'file_name' Parameter Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4598.body: Ecava IntegraXor is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting this issue will allow an attacker to view arbitrary local files within the context of the webserver. Information harvested may aid in launching further attacks.IntegraXor 3.6.4000.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-4602.title: IBM Rational ClearQuest  View Record Browser Bookmark Information Disclosure Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4602.body: IBM Rational ClearQuest is prone to an information-disclosure vulnerability. An attacker can exploit this issue to gain access to sensitive information, that may lead to further attacks.Versions prior to IBM Rational ClearQuest 7.1.1.4, and 7.1.2.1 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-4612.title: Hycus CMS Multiple Input Validation Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-4612.body: Hycus CMS is prone to multiple input-validation vulnerabilities because it fails to adequately sanitize user-supplied input. These vulnerabilities include multiple local file-include and multiple SQL-injection issues.Exploiting these issues can allow attacker view local files within the context of the webserver, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. Other attacks may also be possible.Hycus CMS 1.0.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-4615.title: Oto Galery Multiple SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-4615.body: Oto Galery is prone to multiple SQL-injection vulnerabilities because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting these issues could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2010-4619.title: Mafya Oyun Scrpti 'profil.php' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4619.body: Mafya Oyun Scrpti is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because the application fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in an SQL query. A successful exploit could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit vulnerabilities in the underlying database.

CVE-2010-4622.title: IBM Tivoli Access Manager for e-business Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4622.body: IBM Tivoli Access Manager for e-business is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input. Exploiting this issue will allow an attacker to view arbitrary local files within the context of the webserver. Information harvested may aid in launching further attacks.IBM Tivoli Access Manager for e-business 6.1.1 is vulnerable.

CVE-2010-4623.title: IBM Tivoli Access Manager for e-business (CVE-2010-4623) Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4623.body: IBM Tivoli Access Manager for e-business is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Remote attackers can exploit this issue to cause the service to crash or hang, denying service to legitimate users.IBM Tivoli Access Manager for e-business 6.1.1 is vulnerable.

CVE-2010-4631.title: ASPilot Pilot Cart Multiple Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-4631.body: ASPilot Pilot Cart is prone to multiple vulnerabilities, including multiple HTML-injection, cross-site scripting, and SQL-injection issues.Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database. ASPilot Pilot Cart 7.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-4633.title: digiSHOP 'id' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4633.body: digiSHOP is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue can allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.digiSHOP version 2.0.2 is vulnerable; others may also be affected.

CVE-2010-4635.title: Site2Nite Multiple Products 'detail.asp' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4635.body: Multiple Site2Nite products are prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because they fail to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Site2Nite Business eListings and Site2Nite Vacation Rental are vulnerable; other products may also be affected.

CVE-2010-4636.title: Site2Nite Multiple Products 'detail.asp' SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4636.body: Multiple Site2Nite products are prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because they fail to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue could allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Site2Nite Business eListings and Site2Nite Vacation Rental are vulnerable; other products may also be affected.

CVE-2010-4639.title: RETIRED: MySource Matrix CMS 'id' Parameter SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4639.body: MySource Matrix CMS is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data before using it in an SQL query.Exploiting this issue can allow an attacker to compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.RETIRED: The vendor disputes this vulnerability, indicating that the issue is not exploitable as described.

CVE-2010-4640.title: XWiki Watch HTML Injection and Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-4640.body: XWiki Watch is prone to multiple HTML-injection vulnerabilities and a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input. An attacker may leverage the issues to execute arbitrary script code in the browser of an unsuspecting user in the context of the affected site. This may allow the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, control how the site is rendered to the user, or launch other attacks.XWiki Watch 1.0 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-4641.title: XWiki Enterprise Unspecified SQL Injection and Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-4641.body: XWiki Enterprise is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability and a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. Exploiting these vulnerabilities could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Versions prior to XWiki Enterprise 2.5 are affected.

CVE-2010-4642.title: XWiki Enterprise Unspecified SQL Injection and Cross Site Scripting Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-4642.body: XWiki Enterprise is prone to an SQL-injection vulnerability and a cross-site scripting vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied data. Exploiting these vulnerabilities could allow an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials, compromise the application, access or modify data, or exploit latent vulnerabilities in the underlying database.Versions prior to XWiki Enterprise 2.5 are affected.

CVE-2010-4643.title: OpenOffice Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-4643.body: OpenOffice is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code in the context of the application. Failed exploit attempts will crash the application. Attackers may also create or overwrite local files by exploiting the directory-traversal issue.

CVE-2010-4644.title: Apache Subversion Server Component Multiple Remote Denial Of Service Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-4644.body: Apache Subversion is prone to multiple remote denial-of-service vulnerabilities. Attackers can exploit these issues to crash the subversion server.Versions prior to Apache Subversion 1.6.15 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-4645.title: PHP 'zend_strtod()' Function Floating-Point Value Denial of Service Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4645.body: PHP is prone to a remote denial-of-service vulnerability. Successful attacks will cause applications written in PHP to hang, creating a denial-of-service condition. PHP 5.3.3 is vulnerable; other versions may also be affected.

CVE-2010-4646.title: Hastymail2 'htmLawed.php' HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4646.body: Hastymail2 is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content.Attacker-supplied HTML and script code would run in the context of the affected site, potentially allowing an attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user; other attacks are also possible. Versions prior to Hastymail2 1.01 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-4649.title: Linux Kernel 'ib_uverbs_poll_cq()' Integer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4649.body: The Linux kernel is prone to an integer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to properly validate user-supplied input. Local attackers can exploit this issue to run arbitrary code with elevated privileges. Failed exploit attempts may crash the affected kernel, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2010-4651.title: GNU patch Path Name Directory Traversal Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4651.body: GNU patch is prone to a directory-traversal vulnerability because it fails to sufficiently sanitize user-supplied input in path names.Exploiting this issue will allow an attacker to use directory-traversal characters in a specially crafted patch file to create arbitrary files on an affected computer.

CVE-2010-4652.title: ProFTPD 'mod_sql' Remote Heap Based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4652.body: ProFTPD is prone to a remote heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability.Attackers can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM-level privileges. Failed exploit attempts will result in a denial-of-service condition.

CVE-2010-4653.title: Xpdf Multiple Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-4653.body: Xpdf is prone to multiple remote code-execution vulnerabilities. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application or to crash the application, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2010-4656.title: Linux Kernel I/O-Warrior USB Device Heap Buffer Overflow Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4656.body: The Linux kernel is prone to a heap-based buffer-overflow vulnerability because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. Attackers can exploit this issue to execute arbitrary code with superuser privileges, facilitating the complete compromise of affected computers. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the kernel, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2010-4665.title: LibTIFF Multiple Buffer Overflow Vulnerabilities
CVE-2010-4665.body: LibTIFF is prone to multiple buffer-overflow vulnerabilities because it fails to perform adequate boundary checks on user-supplied data. An attacker can exploit these issues to execute arbitrary malicious code in the context of a user running an application that uses the affected library. Failed exploit attempts will likely crash the application. LibTIFF versions prior to 3.9.5 are affected.

CVE-2010-4669.body: Multiple vendors' products are prone to an IPv6-related denial-of-service vulnerability.A remote attacker can exploit this issue to make affected computers and devices unresponsive, denying service to legitimate users.

CVE-2010-4670.body: Multiple vendors' products are prone to an IPv6-related denial-of-service vulnerability.A remote attacker can exploit this issue to make affected computers and devices unresponsive, denying service to legitimate users.

Failed exploit attempts will cause denial-of-service conditions.gif2png 2.5.3 are earlier are affected.

CVE-2010-4695.title: gif2png GIF Pathname Local File Creation Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4695.body: gif2png is prone to a security vulnerability that may allow attackers to create files in unintended directories. Successfully exploiting this issue will allow attackers to create PNG files in unintended directories. This may allow attackers to cause a denial-of-service condition or corrupt memory.

CVE-2010-4697.title: PHP Zend Engine (CVE-2010-4697) Use-after-free Heap Corruption Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4697.body: PHP is prone to a remote heap-corruption vulnerability. Successful attacks will cause applications written in PHP to hang, creating a denial-of-service condition. Due to the nature of this issue, it may be possible to leverage this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, but this has not been confirmed.Versions prior to PHP 5.2.15 and 5.3.4 are vulnerable.

CVE-2010-4949.title: Joomla! FreiChat Component Unspecified HTML Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2010-4949.body: Joomla! FreiChat component is prone to an HTML-injection vulnerability because it fails to properly sanitize user-supplied input before using it in dynamically generated content.Successful exploits will allow attacker-supplied HTML and script code to run in the context of the affected browser, potentially allowing the attacker to steal cookie-based authentication credentials or to control how the site is rendered to the user. Other attacks are also possible.Versions prior to FreiChat 2.1.2 are vulnerable.
